comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Appears to be Lake Skadar, "also called Lake Scutari and Lake Shkodër", in northern Albania, based on the similarities between the pictured bridge and this recent photo.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Scutari is the Italian name for the Albanian city of Shkodër en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shkod%C3%ABr It was the site of a Serbian invasion in the summer of 1915. This photo is a postcard. A clearer copy is i.ebayimg.com/t/Albania-Shkodra-Scutari-Skutari-Total-Vie...(KGrHqFHJ!sE63KsnD3yBO33ZjdSmg~~60_57.JPG from ebay auction: www.ebay.com/itm/Albania-Shkodra-Scutari-Skutari-Total-Vi... A similar view, from a postcard cancelled in 1924 from a Flickr group, Vintage Albanian Images: www.flickr.com/groups/albanianvintage/
